scripts.init: npm run install:all && npm run link
scripts.postinit:prod: npm run init:db && npm run fill:db
scripts.link: npm run link:core && npm run link:logger && npm run link:clib && npm run link:capp && npm run link:slib && npm run link:sapp
scripts.link:logger: cd ../m2l-node-logger && npm link && npm link m2l-core
scripts.link:clib: cd booking-client/booking-client-lib && npm link && npm link m2l-core
scripts.link:capp: cd booking-client/booking-client-app && npm link m2l-core booking-client-lib
scripts.link:slib: cd booking-server/booking-server-lib && npm link && npm link m2l-core m2l-node-logger
scripts.link:sapp: cd booking-server/booking-server-app && npm link m2l-core m2l-node-logger booking-server-lib
scripts.install:all: npm run install:capp && npm run install:sapp && npm run install:clib && npm run install:slib && npm run install:logger && npm run install:core
scripts.build:dep: concurrently "npm run build:core" "npm run build:logger" "npm run build:clib" "npm run build:slib"
